name: linelord
description: Analyze git blame data with developer contribution statistics

scripts.compile:macos: npm run compile:macos-intel && npm run compile:macos-arm
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run compile:macos && npm run compile:linux && npm run compile:linux-arm && npm run package-release
scripts.package-release: mkdir -p release && cp dist/* release/ && cd release && for file in linelord-*; do tar -czf "$file.tar.gz" "$file" && rm "$file"; done
scripts.tag-release: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && bun run tag-release
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && bun run tag-release
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && bun run tag-release
